Object Oriented Programming

This is the page of the Object Oriented Programming course (2017-1)

Universidad Nacional de Colombia

References

  • [Barker] J. Barker, Beginning Java Objects: From Concepts To Code, Second Edition, Apress, 2005.
  • [McLaughlin] B.D. McLaughlin, G. Pollice, and D. West, Head First Object-Oriented Analysis and Design, O'Reilly Media, Inc., 2006.
  • [Sierra] K. Sierra and B. Bates, Head First Java, 2nd Edition, O'Reilly Media, 2005.
  • [Deitel] H.M. Deitel and P.J. Deitel, Java How to Program, Prentice Hall, 2007 - 7th ed.
  • [Eckel] B. Eckel, Thinking in Java, Prentice Hall PTR, 2006. - 3rd ed. Available online.
  • [Schach] S. Schach, Object-Oriented and Classical Software Engineering, McGraw-Hill Science/Engineering/Math, 2006.
  • [Oracle] Java SE Tutorials, available at: http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/index.html
Object Oriented Programming is maintained by Alejandro Velasco and the Colectivo de Investigación en Ingeniería de Software ColSWE. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
